comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: There's a typo in the LOC caption, this is SMS Ostfriesland, a Helgoland-class battleship of the Imperial German Navy. Ostfriesland would survive the war, only to be turned over to the United States as part of war reparations in April 1920. It is while in the United States that the Ostfriesland would gain its historical notoriety as a target ship, and be forever linked with air power proponent General Billy Mitchell. See Aerofiles: aerofiles.com/ostfriesland.html

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: There is a typo, her name is Ostfriesland (SMS) An early German Dreadnought, she survived the war like most German battlewagons. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SMS_Ostfriesland

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for catching the typo and for the further information.  We'll adjust the description when we update.
